amendment.description: To reduce the number of H-2C nonimmigrants to 200,000 during any fiscal year.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3981 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 3981 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 18 - 79. Record Vote Number: 124.
Amendment SA 3981 proposed by Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S4600-4603; text: CR S4600) To reduce the number of H-2C nonimmigrants to 200,000 during any fiscal year.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3981 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 3981 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 18 - 79. Record Vote Number: 124.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3981 proposed by Senator Bingaman.
